title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Policy Tips revamp on Outlook Win32 desktop (U.S. Government clouds)
description: Expand the functionality of DLP Policy Tips in Outlook Win32 to support additional top predicates and exceptions, and advanced classification for E5 users. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
